column4: when you print a document in evince, what controls the print dialog that appears?
it is a gnome window basically
so a bug there should be reported to gnome?
have you searched for the bug
I am trying to figuer out where to look for it ;)
i did not see your bug, but I google it usually, and it leads to launchpad
try to open a pdf in evince, click print, select range: 1 and "even pages"
but the print preview shows an odd error, instead of pinpointing the mistake
so you are asking it to do something impossible
I would think this would be an evince bug
yes, but the error message doesn't help at all
so include that in your bug report
